translation:
Piratini Most Excellent

Yesterday I arrived in this city detained by the order of the General-in-chief, which was addressed to me by General Bento Gonçalves and delivered by Major Glória. Yesterday itself I wished to present myself to Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

Your compatriot, subject, and friend Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre
